Welcome to pommes-dispatch’s documentation!¶

A bottom-up fundamental power market model for the German electricity sector

This is the documentation of pommes-dispatch, the dispatch variant of the fundamental power market model POMMES (POwer Market Model of Energy and re Sources).

If you are intested in the data preparation routine, you can find a description here. The investment model is described here.
